meanings.definition: A place or scene of activity, debate, or conflict.
meanings.sent1: The school playground was an arena for games and races.
meanings.sent2: The political arena can be quite intense during election season.
meanings.sent3: The ants turned the picnic area into their own tiny arena of chaos.
meanings.sent4: The courtroom became an arena of verbal battles between the lawyers.
meanings.sent5: The arena of the kitchen was filled with the delicious smell of baking cookies.

meanings.definition: A building for sports or entertainment events.
meanings.sent1: The new arena in town hosted a basketball game last night.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly in the arena as the concert began.
meanings.sent3: The arena was so big, it felt like a giant spaceship ready for takeoff.
meanings.sent4: The arena lights shone brightly like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The arena echoed with the sounds of music and laughter during the event.

meanings.definition: A sphere of interest or activity.
meanings.sent1: Her passion for art made the art world her arena of creativity.
meanings.sent2: In the business arena, competition can be fierce.
meanings.sent3: The arena of fashion design is always changing and evolving.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an arena of ideas, constantly buzzing with new thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The online gaming arena offers a variety of challenges for players to conquer.
